name: get_notifications
description: Retrieves Android notifications with optional filtering.

sender_name.description: Filters notifications by sender or group name, which must be a non-empty string with a maximum of 256 characters.

app_name.description: A non-empty string with a maximum of 256 characters used to filter notifications by application name.

unread.description: Specifies whether to fetch unread notifications and mark them as read (`True`, default), or to fetch only read notifications (`False`).

name: reply_notification
description: Reply to a notification with confirmation.

key.description: A unique bundle identifier for the reply, which must be a non-empty string up to 256 characters long.

message_body.description: The reply message text, which must be a non-empty string.

recipient_name.description: The display name of the recipient, a non-empty string with a maximum length of 256 characters.

app_name.description: Optional application name for the reply; must be a non-empty string with a maximum length of 256 characters if specified.

app_package_name.description: Optional package name. If provided, it must be a non-empty string with a maximum length of 256 characters.

name: reply_notification_message_or_contact_missing
description: Handle reply attempts that lack a message body or recipient.
